metadata.description: Binary flag mapping for Phase 2 data quality issues

flag_mapping.1: Contradictory values found in Window Seat and Aisle Seat columns.
flag_mapping.2: Departure date after arrival date detected.
flag_mapping.4: Mismatch between Layovers count and layover locations list.

1.description: Contradictory values found in Window Seat and Aisle Seat columns.
1.fix_approach: Ensure only one of Window Seat or Aisle Seat is true per row.

2.description: Departure date after arrival date detected.
2.fix_approach: Correct the departure and arrival date values.

4.description: Mismatch between Layovers count and layover locations list.
4.fix_approach: Ensure the number of Layovers matches the number of layover locations.
